phase_tunneler.name: Phase Tunneler
phase_tunneler.desc: Uses quantum phase transfer to make enemy ship go boom while mostly ignoring armor.

nanoscale_armor.name: Nanoscale Armor
nanoscale_armor.desc: Extremely durable and light armor, but rather fragile after the first hit.

star_cloak.name: Star Cloak
star_cloak.desc: True stealth can only be achieved through being too bright to look at.
